tuv.seg: Making a late claim
Éileamh a chur isteach go déanach
To get a social welfare payment, you must make a claim for that payment to the Department of Social Protection
Chun íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh a fháil, ní mór duit éileamh a chur isteach don íocaíocht sin chuig an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí
You normally make a claim by completing an application or claim form
De ghnáth, cuireann tú isteach éileamh trí fhoirm iarratais nó trí fhoirm éilimh a líonadh amach
There are generally time limits within which you must make your claim
Go ginearálta, tá teorainneacha ama ina gcaithfidh tú d’éileamh a chur isteach
The time limits for making a claim vary from one payment to another
Athraíonn na teorainneacha ama chun éileamh a chur isteach ó íocaíocht amháin go ceann eile
The time limits are generally quite short for short-term payments and are longer for long-term pensions
Tá na teorainneacha ama sách gearr go ginearálta le haghaidh íocaíochtaí gearrthéarmacha agus tá siad níos faide le haghaidh pinsin fhad-téarmaigh

For example, in the case of Jobseeker's Benefit you must claim on the day that you become eligible and in the case of State Pension (Contributory) you can claim up to 3 months before and 3 months after you reach the age of 66

Mar shampla, i gcás Shochar Cuardaitheora Poist ní mór duit an t-éileamh a chur isteach ar an lá céanna atá tú incháilithe agus i gcás an Phinsin Stáit (Ranníocach) is féidir leat éileamh a chur isteach suas go trí mhí sula agus trí mhí tar éis 66 bliana d’aois a bhaint amach
You should claim a payment as soon as you think you might be entitled to it
Ba chóir duit íocaíocht a éileamh chomh luath is a cheapann tú go d'fhéadfá a bheith i dteideal í
If you make a late claim you may get a payment from the date you sent your claim to the department but you may not get your payment back-dated to the time you were entitled to it but did not claim

Má chuireann tú isteach ar éileamh déanach is féidir leat íocaíocht a fháil ón dáta ar sheol tú d'éileamh chuig an roinn ach ní féidir leat siardhátú a fháil go dtí an t-am a raibh tú i dteideal í ach nár chuir tú isteach éileamh lena haghaidh
Extending the time limits
Teorainneacha ama a shíneadh
In most cases the time limit for making a claim may be extended
I bhformhór na gcásanna is féidir leis an teorainn ama le haghaidh éileamh a chur isteach a shíneadh
This means you can get your payment back-dated to the time that you became entitled to it or for least six months before you made your claim, whichever is the lower
Ciallaíonn sé seo gur féidir leat siardhátú a fháil go dtí an t-am a raibh tú i dteideal í nó ar a laghad sé mhí sula gcuir tú isteach ar d'éileamh, cibé acu is ísle
To get the time limit extended you must have a good reason for not making your claim within the time limit
Chun an teorainn ama sínithe a fháil ní mór duit cúis mhaith a bheith agat gan d'éileamh a chur isteach laistigh den teorainn ama
There is little information about what is a good reason but if you were sick or in hospital this might well be considered as a good reason for not making your claim on time
Níl mórán eolais faoi cad is cúis mhaith ann ach má bhí tú tinn nó san ospidéal d'fhéadfadh sé seo a mheas mar chúis mhaith gan d'éileamh a chur isteach in am
Generally, the fact that you did not know that you were entitled to a payment is not considered to be a good reason for not making your claim on time
Go ginearálta, ní mheastar nach raibh a fhios agat go raibh tú i dteideal íocaíochta a bheith ina chúis mhaith gan d'éileamh a chur isteach in am

Invalidity Pension is backdated up to 6 months or to the date of your claim, whichever is the lower, without having to show a good reason for the delay in making your claim

Mar sin féin, is féidir siardhátú a fháil ar Phinsean Stáit (Ranníocach), Pinsean Baintrí, Baintrí Fir nó Páirtnéara Shibhialta Mharthanaigh (Ranníocach), Pinsean Stáit (Eatramhach) agus Íocaíocht Caomhnóra (Ranníocach) suas go 12 mhí gan chúis mhaith a bheith agat

From April 2012, backdating is limited to 6 months for State Pension (Contributory and Transition), Widow’s, Widower’s, or Surviving Civil Partner’s (Contributory) Pension and Guardian’s Payment (Contributory)
D’fhéadfaí éileamh a shiardhátú níos sia siar ná 6 mhí más amhlaidh gur ceachtar den dá chúis seo a leanas a chuir moill ar an éileamh:
Further backdating will be allowed only if:
Eolas mícheart a sholáthair an Roinn nó
• The failure to claim resulted from incorrect information being supplied by the Department of Social Protection or
Éagumas an éilitheora mar gheall ar bhreoiteacht nó éiglíocht
The Household Benefits Package can be backdated in some instances
Tugtar oifigigh breithiúnachta ar na hoifigigh seo
At the time of your claim you must state why your claim is late
Ag am d'éilimh ní mór duit a rá cén fáth go bhfuil d'éileamh déanach
For some payments the application form allows you to explain why the payment is late, for example, Illness Benefit
I gcás roinnt íocaíochtaí ligeann an fhoirm iarratais duit a mhíniú cén fáth go bhfuil an íocaíocht dhéanach, mar shampla, Sochar Breoiteachta
For other payments you should send an accompanying letter and supporting evidence with your claim form
Le haghaidh íocaíochtaí eile ba chóir duit litir thionlacain agus fianaise tacaíochta a chur le d'fhoirm éilimh
You can get assistance with this from your Intreo Centre or local Social Welfare Branch Office or Citizens Information Centre
Is féidir leat cúnamh a fháil leis seo, ó d'Oifig Áitiúil Leasa Shóisialaigh áitiúil nó d'Lárionad Faisnéise do Shaoránaigh
You should send your claim form with details about why your claim is late to the section in the Department of Social Protection responsible for that payment
Ba chóir duit d'fhoirm éilimh le sonraí faoin bhfáth a bhfuil d'éileamh déanach chuig an rannóg sa Roinn Coimirice Sóisialaí a atá freagrach as an íocaíocht sin
The address will be on the bottom of your claim form
Beidh an seoladh ag bun d'fhoirm éilimh
